title: Beyond My Imagination
description: This book, based on my experiences as a piano teacher at after school programs, is about a music teacher who has a passion for developing talent in children. Not everyone agrees with what she is tring to do for some of the children. Will she be able to carry out her mission to bring music instruction to everyone?The book, for parents and pre-teens, details my teaching method and contains some music instruction.
author: Gail Cavanaugh
